import { format } from 'date-fns' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {FormaformatISO9075} from '' export const Post = ({ title, summary, cover, content, createdAt, author }) => { return (

{title}

{author.username} {formatISO9075(new Date(createdAt))}

{summary}

); } export default Post
